message.content: {"given_definition_quality":50,"better_definition":"to walk; to go on foot","sentence":"他走路。","image_prompt":"A young man walking on a cracked, overgrown city street, under a cloudy sky with ruined buildings and distant fires; the style is soft apocalypse animation, muted colors, gentle glow, slight overgrowth, the man looking determined.","sentence_translation":"He walks."}
